car_technology_news.title: Ferrari Unveils Hybrid Supercar SF90 Stradale
car_technology_news.summary: Ferrari has introduced the SF90 Stradale, a hybrid supercar combining a V8 engine with three electric motors, offering unprecedented performance and efficiency.

car_technology_news.title: Lamborghini's Aventador Successor Spotted Testing
car_technology_news.summary: Spy shots reveal Lamborghini testing the successor to the Aventador, expected to feature a new hybrid powertrain and cutting-edge aerodynamic design.

car_technology_news.title: Mercedes-AMG GT Black Series Sets New Nürburgring Record
car_technology_news.summary: The Mercedes-AMG GT Black Series has set a new lap record at the Nürburgring, showcasing its advanced engineering and high-performance capabilities.

car_technology_news.title: Porsche 911 GT3 RS: The Ultimate Track Weapon
car_technology_news.summary: Porsche has released the 911 GT3 RS, featuring a naturally aspirated flat-six engine and a suite of track-focused technologies to dominate the racetrack.
